CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Human Resources relative to Sales Team?
SRP.A: Human Resources is {above} Sales Team in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Operations Staff}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Human Resources}.

VE.Q: What is Human Resources's Training Hours in 2017?
VE.A: Human Resources's training hours in 2017 is {8.21} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What is Administrative Support's Training Hours in 2013?
VE.A: Administrative Support's training hours in 2013 is {15.25} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What is Research & Development's Training Hours in 2017?
VE.A: Research & Development's training hours in 2017 is {15.19} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What are the training hours of Human Resources, Administrative Support, and Sales Team in 2011?
VE.A: Human Resources's training hours is {15.73} hours/employee, Administrative Support's training hours is {22.85} hours/employee, Sales Team's training hours is {16.70} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Training Hours in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum training hours is {4.01} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Training Hours in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum training hours is {83.49} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Training Hours level recorded for Administrative Support?
EVJ.A: Administrative Support reached approximately {24.88} hours/employee in {2015}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Training Hours level recorded for Administrative Support?
EVJ.A: Administrative Support's lowest recorded level is approximately {14.78} hours/employee in {2018}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Training Hours?
SC.A: The average total training hours is {156.07} hours/employee.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Training Hours fall between 145.83 and 161.18 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Training Hours go below 141.66 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {138.72} hours/employee in {2011}, {138.13} hours/employee in {2014}, {132.57} hours/employee in {2012}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Training Hours exceed 165.34 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {181.43} hours/employee in {2022}, {176.48} hours/employee in {2021}, {193.08} hours/employee in {2023}.

NC.Q: Between 2009 and 2020, was the average total Training Hours higher or lower than between 2010 and 2014?
NC.A: The average total training hours between 2009 and 2020 was {higher} than between 2010 and 2014.

NC.Q: Was the total Training Hours in 2016 higher or lower than in 2022?
NC.A: The total training hours in 2016 was {lower} than in 2022.

NC.Q: Between 2011 and 2022, did the total Training Hours experience a larger or smaller change than between 2009 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total training hours between 2011 and 2022 was {larger} than between 2009 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 2011 and 2013, did the total Training Hours experience a larger or smaller change than between 2015 and 2022?
NC.A: The change in total training hours between 2011 and 2013 was {smaller} than between 2015 and 2022.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Operations Staff} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Management Team, Human Resources, Sales Team, Research & Development, Administrative Support, Operations Staff, Engineering Department}.
